item.title: JOJO-ADABOOST
item.description:
ADABOOST (tech)

Short for Adaptive Boosting, is a machine learning meta-algorithm that uses an ensemble learning approach to weight various inputs.

简单来说，这是一种使用一个集成学习方法来对多种输入加权的机器学习元算法

item.title: 2018-0128code ANCIENT MANUSCRIPTS
item.description: e bdbbbbbbdcbdbcbccdbbccbbbcebbbbccbbdbbdbbccbbcbccbcdbbdcdc 按b=1 c=2 d=3 e=4换成数字 1311111132131212231122111241111221131131122112122123113232 然后用游程编码转成01 011101010100011011101101100111010011010110000101011001011101000101100101101100100111010001100011 96位，可被6整除，考虑盲文 根据盲文格式分组（6位一组竖着写成两列）后得到： ezc32murder642ns t3wjrde7c8eu2us8 先排

item.title: 2017-1211code THE AEGIS SHIELD AND THE QUANTUM CAPSULE
item.description: e \/\\\////\/\///\\/\////\\//\\////\\/\/\\////\//\\\/\/\/\\\\\ 60位，考虑盲文 6位一组分组，再按盲文变化形式转换得 5rvt8v4g9a 补上关键词defend 5rvt8defendv4g9a 参见近期类似一篇2017-1203code PERSONS OF INTEREST: MYSELF (PAC) uxtrrurxutszsqststsqrstquursutsy At

item.title: 2017-1203code PERSONS OF INTEREST: MYSELF (PAC)
item.description: e \//\\\//\/\\/////\/\////\//\\\///\\/\//\\\///\\/\/\\\//\/\/\ 60位由两种字符组成的串，考虑盲文 按盲文格式分组，转得 2fqy2v2v5o 因为由\/组成，补上关键词defend（glyph图形为\/） 2fqy2defendv2v5o 2rsavdhi8ukm71f879k8 间隔分组 2svh8k7f7k radium1898 前
